column4: Glass is 100% recyclable and can be recycled endlessly
Each ton of recycled paper can save 17 trees and 380 gallons of oil
eWaste comprises 70% of our overall toxic waste and signifcantly impacts our waterways
Average homes can accumulate household wastes in storage areas, garages and sheds
Aluminium is considered a sustainable metal, which means it can be recycled again and again
When one ton of plastic bottles is recycled, almost four barrels of oil are saved
Recycling reduces the need for more landfills and no one wants to live next to a landfill
Up to 30% of materials put into the rubbish bin can be composted
Nearly 100 percent of textiles and clothing are recyclable
If disposed of improperly, appliances can become environmentally harmful and poison ecosystems
Furniture that cannot be re-used by someone else can often be recycled
Cut your environmental footprint by donating rather than throwing out quality surplus food
